title: One Piece: Episode of East Blue
description: Luffy and His 4 Crewmates' Big Adventure is a TV Special of the One Piece anime. It is an abridged retelling of the entire East Blue Saga, and will also animate several cover pages.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
